frontmatter.title: Shiny and networkd3
frontmatter.subtitle: Creating network visualizations using the networkd3 package and advanced customisations
frontmatter.excerpt: Network visualizations are a great way of showing connectivity in a sample. The networkD3 package allows you to build interactive visualizations.
